text: @DeAnna4Congress Simple math shows that with 86,465 dead that one person dies of COVID-19 for every 3.66 people recovered.   Dr. Fauci reports that the COVID-19 deaths are underreported so that number may be worse.   Is that something the Trump Administration should be proud of?
